CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Rusty Kettle relative to The Golden Spoon?
SRP.A: The Rusty Kettle is {below} The Golden Spoon in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Plate relative to Sky High Cafe?
SRP.A: Crimson Plate is {above} Sky High Cafe in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Emerald Diner relative to The Cozy Nook?
SRP.A: Emerald Diner is {below} The Cozy Nook in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {The Rusty Kettle}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Emerald Diner}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Emerald Diner's maximum Customer Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Emerald Diner's maximum Customer Traffic is in {1981}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Sky High Cafe's maximum Customer Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Sky High Cafe's maximum Customer Traffic is in {1982}.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Traffic in 1985 higher or lower than in 1986?
NC.A: The total customer traffic in 1985 was {lower} than in 1986.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Traffic in 1981 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The total customer traffic in 1981 was {higher} than in 1984.

NC.Q: Between 1996 and 2004, was the average total Customer Traffic higher or lower than between 1984 and 1994?
NC.A: The average total customer traffic between 1996 and 2004 was {higher} than between 1984 and 1994.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2002, was the average total Customer Traffic higher or lower than between 1981 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total customer traffic between 1998 and 2002 was {higher} than between 1981 and 1987.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {The Rusty Kettle} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Stellar Bistro and The Golden Spoon first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Stellar Bistro and The Golden Spoon first exchanged leading positions in {1982}.
